## Import Data: Energy & Mining


```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, include=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
health <- read_csv("health.csv", na = c("n/a", "", "NA"))%>%
  janitor::clean_names() 

names(health)
```


```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, include=TRUE, warning=FALSE}

world <- health %>%
filter(country_name=="World")  %>%

  subset(year!=1960 & year!=1970 & year!=1980 & year!=1990 )%>%
  ggplot(aes(year,population_total ))+
  geom_point()
world
```
